entry.name: AlienAggression
entry.value: Alien Aggression

entry.name: AlienAggression0
entry.value: Very Low

entry.name: AlienAggression0Hint
entry.value: Aliens turn hostile very late and are willing to travel only very short distances from their home territories in order to attack. Hives hatch new xenomorphs extremely slowly.

entry.name: AlienAggression1Hint
entry.value: Aliens turn hostile relatively late and are willing to travel short distances from their home territories in order to attack. Hives hatch new xenomorphs quite slowly.

entry.name: AlienAggression2Hint
entry.value: Aliens turn hostile reasonably fast and are willing to travel moderate distances from their home territories in order to attack. Hives hatch new xenomorphs at an average speed.

entry.name: AlienAggression3Hint
entry.value: Aliens turn hostile quite fast and are willing to travel considerable distances from their home territories in order to attack. Hives hatch new xenomorphs relatively quickly.

entry.name: AlienAggression4
entry.value: Very High

entry.name: AlienAggression4Hint
entry.value: Aliens turn hostile extremely fast and are willing to travel immense distances from their home territories in order to attack. Hives hatch new xenomorphs very quickly.

entry.name: AlienAggression5Hint
entry.value: The alien aggression is determined randomly at the start of the game.

entry.name: AlliedVictory
entry.value: Allied Victory

entry.name: Difficulty0
entry.value: Very Easy

entry.name: Difficulty0Hint
entry.value: The AI suffers a slight penalty compared to the player.

entry.name: Difficulty1Hint
entry.value: The AI has no advantage over the player.

entry.name: Difficulty2Hint
entry.value: The AI gains a slight advantage over the player.

entry.name: Difficulty3Hint
entry.value: The AI gains a moderate advantage over the player.

entry.name: Difficulty4
entry.value: Very Hard

entry.name: Difficulty4Hint
entry.value: The AI gains a considerable advantage over the player.

entry.name: Difficulty5Hint
entry.value: The difficulty level for each AI faction is determined randomly at the start of the game.

entry.name: EconomyVictory
entry.value: Economic Victory

entry.name: DropInHint
entry.value: Allow joining players to take over disconnected and AI players after the game has started. Normally joining players may only reconnect or take over spectator slots.

entry.name: GameVisibility
entry.value: Game Visibility

entry.name: GameVisibility0
entry.value: Friends Only

entry.name: GameVisibility0Hint
entry.value: Game is only joinable through friends lists, invites or direct connect.

entry.name: GameVisibility1Hint
entry.value: Game is only joinable through invites or direct connect.

entry.name: GameVisibility2Hint
entry.value: Game shows in public lists and is joinable by anyone.

entry.name: MilitaryVictory
entry.value: Military Victory

entry.name: Pace0Hint
entry.value: Decreases costs and durations by 50%.

entry.name: Pace1Hint
entry.value: Does not modify costs or durations.

entry.name: Pace2Hint
entry.value: Increases costs and durations by 50%.

entry.name: Pace3Hint
entry.value: Increases costs and durations by 100%.

entry.name: Pace4Hint
entry.value: The pace is determined randomly at the start of the game.

entry.name: RandomizedResearchTree
entry.value: Randomized Research Tree

entry.name: ResearchVictory
entry.value: Research Victory

entry.name: RevealedResearchTiers
entry.value: Revealed Research Tiers

entry.name: RevealedResearchTiers0Hint
entry.value: Technologies one tier ahead are revealed.

entry.name: RevealedResearchTiers1Hint
entry.value: Technologies two tiers ahead are revealed.

entry.name: RevealedResearchTiers2Hint
entry.value: Technologies three tiers ahead are revealed.

entry.name: RevealedResearchTiers3Hint
entry.value: Technologies four tiers ahead are revealed.

entry.name: RevealedResearchTiers4Hint
entry.value: The whole research tree is revealed from the start.

entry.name: RevealedResearchTiers5Hint
entry.value: Revealed research tiers are determined randomly at the start of the game.

entry.name: Shape
entry.value: World Shape

entry.name: Shape0Hint
entry.value: The world is shaped in the form of several smaller islands with water covering 80% of the planetary surface. Naval exploration and warfare play a vital role.

entry.name: Shape1Hint
entry.value: The world is shaped in the form of a few large continents with water covering 70% of the planetary surface. Balanced forces are the key to military success.

entry.name: Shape2Hint
entry.value: The world is shaped in the form of one massive super-continent with water covering 60% of the planetary surface. Strong army ground troops are highly recommended.

entry.name: Shape3Hint
entry.value: World shape is determined randomly at the start of the game.

entry.name: Size
entry.value: World Size

entry.name: Size0Hint
entry.value: A tiny world spans 24x24 for a total of 576 territories.

entry.name: Size0HintFactions
entry.value: There are two landing human factions, for an average of about 8 cities per faction.

entry.name: Size1Hint
entry.value: A small world spans 32x32 for a total of 1024 territories.

entry.name: Size1HintFactions
entry.value: There are four landing human factions, for an average of about 7 cities per faction..

entry.name: Size2Hint
entry.value: A medium world spans 40x40 for a total of 1600 territories.

entry.name: Size2HintFactions
entry.value: There are six landing human factions, for an average of about 8 cities per faction..

entry.name: Size3Hint
entry.value: A large world spans 48x48 for a total of 2304 territories.

entry.name: Size3HintFactions
entry.value: There are six landing human factions, for an average of about 11 cities per faction.

entry.name: Size4Hint
entry.value: A huge world spans 56x56 for a total of 3136 territories.

entry.name: Size4HintFactions
entry.value: There are six landing human factions, for an average of about 15 cities per faction.

entry.name: Size5Hint
entry.value: World size is determined randomly at the start of the game.

entry.name: Temperature
entry.value: World Temperature

entry.name: Temperature3Hint
entry.value: World temperature is determined randomly at the start of the game.

entry.name: TurnTimer
entry.value: Turn Timer

entry.name: TurnTimer1
entry.value: Very Short (2 minutes)

entry.name: TurnTimer2
entry.value: Very Short (adaptive)

entry.name: TurnTimer3
entry.value: Short (4 minutes)

entry.name: TurnTimer4
entry.value: Short (adaptive)

entry.name: TurnTimer5
entry.value: Moderate (6 minutes)

entry.name: TurnTimer6
entry.value: Moderate (adaptive)

entry.name: TurnTimer7
entry.value: Long (8 minutes)

entry.name: TurnTimer8
entry.value: Long (adaptive)

entry.name: TurnTimer9
entry.value: Very Long (10 minutes)

entry.name: TurnTimer10
entry.value: Very Long (adaptive)

entry.name: Victory1
entry.value: Economic Victory

entry.name: Victory2
entry.value: Military Victory

entry.name: Victory3
entry.value: Research Victory
